<a name="OAuthType"></a>
## type [OAuthType](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/service/provider.go#L10>)

OAuthType enumerates the authentication mechanism required by a service provider.

```go
type OAuthType string
```

<a name="OAuthTypeNone"></a>

```go
const (
    // OAuthTypeNone indicates the provider does not require credentials.
    OAuthTypeNone OAuthType = "none"
    // OAuthTypeOAuth2 indicates the provider uses an OAuth2 flow.
    OAuthTypeOAuth2 OAuthType = "oauth2"
    // OAuthTypeAPIKey indicates the provider expects an API key.
    OAuthTypeAPIKey OAuthType = "apikey"
)
```

<a name="Provider"></a>
## type [Provider](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/service/provider.go#L22-L31>)

Provider represents an automation service integration surfaced in the catalog.

```go
type Provider struct {
    ID          uuid.UUID
    Name        string
    DisplayName string
    Category    string
    OAuthType   OAuthType
    Enabled     bool
    CreatedAt   time.Time
    UpdatedAt   time.Time
}
```

<a name="Provider.RequiresOAuth"></a>
### func \(Provider\) [RequiresOAuth](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/service/provider.go#L34>)

```go
func (p Provider) RequiresOAuth() bool
```

RequiresOAuth reports whether the provider mandates an OAuth2 authorisation flow.
